Bvlevar 21 Apto 1002

Entire loft in Bucaramanga, Colombia

Apartment overlooking the city of Bucaramanga and its airport, located on the 10th floor of the Bvlevar 21 set 5 minutes from San Francisco Park. It has a double bed, desk for study or work, TV, bathroom, washing machine, refrigerator, oven, stove and closet It has a blind and blackout. Parqueadero not included, although one can be rented separately.
